full_summary:
===============

## Tender Announcement

**Tender Name/Purpose**: The Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is soliciting bids for Professional Services – Environmental Services in the Quebec Region as per the Abbreviated Request for Proposals (RFAP).

### Contract Details

| Category | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Contract Duration | 2 years (extendable) |
| Max Estimated Contract Value | $750,000.00 |

### Bid Requirements

* Contractors must provide Professional Services specifically tailored to meet the Department of National Defence (DND) environmental requirements.
* The Security Requirements for this project can be found in the RFAP Documents.
* The Standing Offer (SO) will be used for the provision of expert consulting services.
* Contractors may be called upon to perform tasks valued between $15,000.00 and $100,000.00, with a maximum value of $150,000.00 per call-up.

### Technical Description

The Professional Services – Environmental Services will be used by the DCC in the Quebec Region to provide expert consulting support for projects.

### Evaluation Criteria

The Abbreviated Proposals will be evaluated based on the following established criteria.

### Tender Submission

Firms interested in providing services are invited to submit their Abbreviated Proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System on or before the closing date and time indicated on the Electronic Bidding System.

### Contact Information

For more information about the RFAP, contact:

Camille Attia
Email: [Camille.attia@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:Camille.attia@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
Phone: 613-715-0564
Contradiction Entity Contact:
350 Albert Street
Ottawa ON Canada K1A 0K3

### Trade Agreements

This Tender is open to Ineligible Contractor List (ICL) members who are certified by the DCC and CIPS certified training professionals. The supplier shall have given acknowledgement that it has had access to and reviewed (not necessarily accepted) the security requirements prior to Nov 15.

### Security Impact

 Outsourced information will be double encrypted.
